有乜冬瓜豆腐.pinyin: jau5 me1 dung1 gwaa1 dau6 fu6

李若彤.en: Carmen Lee Yeuk-tung, a Hong Kong actress

水口.en: (a place in Hong Kong) Shui Hau (noun) mouth of a river

海上無魚蝦自大.en: 'in the kingdom of the blind, the one-eyed man is king'
海上無魚蝦自大.pinyin: hoi2 soeng6 mou4 jyu4 haa1 zi6 daai6

滋油淡定.en: the attitude of being relaxed and steady in doing everything

漁人得利.en: 'when two sides quarrel, it is always the third party who benefits'

火藥味.en: the smell of gunpowder; a sense of tension during a heated argument

蒸生瓜.en: (noun) a female who is not mature enough and not elegant enough; (adjective) slow witted

爛船都有三斤釘.en: there must be something useful in anything broken or disused (slang)
爛船都有三斤釘.pinyin: laan6 syun4 dou1 jau5 saam1 gan1 deng1

物語.en: a story; a tale; a legend

生理衛生.en: physiological health (this term is normally used as a more discrete way to refer to sex education)

監人賴厚.en: shamelessly insist another person is one's friend

監熱食.en: eat when the dishes are still hot

盲公竹.en: (noun) a blind person's cane; a guide cane; (of metaphor) a guide who gives directions; a guardian or a mentor who gives directions or advice on life

神台貓屎.en: hated by the gods; despised by the ghosts; hated by everyone (slang)

科技興農.en: Development of agriculture through science and technology

粉嶺.en: Fanling, a town situated in Northern New Territories in Hong Kong

紅鬚軍師.en: an incapable person who always gives useless advice (slang)

綠衣.en: Hong Kong Chinese police officer in early 20th century (spoken)

翻本.en: (verb) get back or obtain back what someone's has lost (usually it refers to money)

脫離關係.en: to disown; to break off all relations with someone; to cut ties

誓願.en: (verb) to swear; to vow an oath

足水.en: to be satisfied and content; complacent

踩嚫條尾.en: to offend someone; to tread on someone's toes

逼使.en: to force (something) on someone; to obtrude; to coerce; to compel

遲嚟先上岸.en: jumped the line; describes a situation where a person who came later than others but managed to do something before others (who came before him, her)

酒餅.en: distiller's yeast; yeast used in alcoholic fermentation

間格.en: layout of a house; room; flag (spoken)

雀仔街.en: Hong Lok Street; a street in Mong Kok, Hong Kong

雙窬牆.en: wall built with two layers of bricks

雞仔餅.en: (Chinese food) Kampar chicken biscuits ,  chicken cookie, a type of snack; (of police officer) a station sergeant

雞包.en: chicken bun, a steamed bun filled with chicken and Chinese mushrooms

順德人.en: people from the Shunde district in in Guangdong, China

餘生.en: the rest ,  remainder of one's life

鬼殺咁嘈.en: (adj.) to describe someone who is very noisy and annoying; to make a big fuss about something

魚樂無窮.en: to have boundless joy (usually used in greetings such as Chinese New Year)

魚肉.en: referring to those who are being butchered ,  exploited; to butcher; to cruelly oppress; to exploit; literally: 'fish flesh'

鴻圖窩麵.en: Hung To noodle soup with crab meat

一人行一步.en: to take a step each; each person playing their part to contribute [written and colloquial]

反肚.en: to die (for a fish to have its belly up) [colloquial]

吽豆.en: an expression to describe someone which is very dull and boring [colloquial]

嘅嚊.en: final particle for making an assertion [colloquial, less commonly used nowadays]

天地堂.en: to have lessons very far apart with a big break in between, such as one early in the morning and the next one not till late in the afternoon [colloquial]

幾天後.en: a few days later; several days later [written]

忠忠直直終須乞食.en: being too honest leads one to poverty [colloquial]

攪乜春呀.en: what's going on?; what the heck are you doing? [colloquial]

期數.en: installments; period within which repayment of a debt os calculated; one's workplace in prison [written and colloquial]

枝嘢.en: bottle of something; (a branch of something) stick ,  pole; the penis [colloquial]

沙煲罌撐.en: pots and pans; cooking utensils; household items [colloquial]

燒你收簿.en: euphemism for 屌你老母, 'fuck your mother', foul language insulting one's mother when cursing someone [colloquial]

由頭嚟過.en: to start from scratch again; to start all over again [colloquial]

當透明.en: to treat someone as a nobody or irrelevant or unimportant [colloquial]

白過.en: to have wasted one's time and not accomplished anything [written and colloquial]

窒住晒.en: to keep interrupting; to break someone's concentration [colloquial]

紮棍.en: to be beaten up as a punishment for breaking triad rules [colloquial]

英美.en: England and America, English and American [written and colloquial]

講乜撚嘢.en: what the fuck are you talking about; what are you bullshitting about [colloquial]

買全鐘.en: to pay to take night club hostess out of the night club [colloquial]

騰上騰落.en: to go up and down; to be busy rushing around everywhere [colloquial]
